testcase.name: test_list_backups

failure.message: TypeError: string indices must be integers, not 'str'

testcase.failure: test_backup_restore.py:440: in test_list_backups backup_ids_in_response = [b["id"] for b in backups if b["id"] in backup_ids] ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ test_backup_restore.py:440: in <listcomp> backup_ids_in_response = [b["id"] for b in backups if b["id"] in backup_ids] ^^^^^^^ E TypeError: string indices must be integers, not 'str'

testcase.name: test_get_backup_details
testcase.failure: test_backup_restore.py:464: in test_get_backup_details assert response.status_code == HTTP_OK E assert 404 == 200 E + where 404 = <Response [404]>.status_code
